The practice of Christian perfection wherein several considerations, cautions, and advices are set down, for the perfecting of the saints, and completing them in the knowledge of Christ Jesus / by Thomas White ... White, Thomas, d. 1682.
[32], 160 p.
Printed by T.M. for Tho. Vere ..., London : 1651.
Running title: A directory to Christian perfection. Imperfect: tightly bound and stained, with some loss of print. Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
